Nigiri Sushi (Tuna).description: Fresh tuna slices on a bed of sushi rice, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

Salmon Sashimi.description: Thinly sliced fresh salmon, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

California Roll.description: A classic roll with sushi rice, crab (real or imitation), avocado, and cucumber wrapped in seaweed.
ingredients: Imitation crab (or real crab), avocado, and cucumber

Eel Unagi Nigiri.description: Grilled eel (unagi) on a small bed of sushi rice, drizzled with eel sauce and served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

Rainbow Roll.description: A colorful roll with sushi rice, assorted sashimi slices, and avocado, wrapped in seaweed.
ingredients: Assorted sashimi slices (tuna, salmon, avocado, etc.)
